title: The Winged go-betweens
creator_credit: Miu Chin and Shanghai Scientific and Educational Film Studio
brief_description: A nature film on the life of bees, concentrating in particular on their most useful function - the pollination of flowers. Using close-ups the camera reveals the work and behaviour of these insects in a way rarely seen before on the screen. A fascinating insight into their world.
creator_credit_for_label: Miu Chin and Shanghai Scientific and Educational Film Studio
